properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.cluster-labels
properties.description: Set the labels used to identify the pods composing the cluster.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.config-map-name
properties.description: Set the name of the ConfigMap used to do optimistic locking (defaults to 'leaders').

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.connection-timeout-millis
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds to use when making requests to the Kubernetes API server.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.enabled
properties.description: Sets if the Kubernetes cluster service should be enabled or not, default is true.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.jitter-factor
properties.description: A jitter factor to apply in order to prevent all pods to call Kubernetes APIs in the same instant.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.kubernetes-namespace
properties.description: Set the name of the Kubernetes namespace containing the pods and the configmap (autodetected by default)

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.lease-duration-millis
properties.description: The default duration of the lease for the current leader.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.master-url
properties.description: Set the URL of the Kubernetes master (read from Kubernetes client properties by default).

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.pod-name
properties.description: Set the name of the current pod (autodetected from container host name by default).

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.renew-deadline-millis
properties.description: The deadline after which the leader must stop its services because it may have lost the leadership.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.retry-period-millis
properties.description: The time between two subsequent attempts to check and acquire the leadership. It is randomized using the jitter factor.
